titleStmt.title: Annotations for 文心雕龍十卷

publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As an inner power, pattern is very great indeed,

sense.def: powerful feature or function (for the structure see 為人 "personality" etc.)

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As an inner power, pattern is very great indeed,

sense.def: pattern; meaningful or aesthetic pattern; cultural pattern

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As an inner power, pattern is very great indeed,

sense.def: be great, be powerful; be substantial; be significant;

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As an inner power, pattern is very great indeed,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As an inner power, pattern is very great indeed,

sense.def: marker of sentential complements, which are typically nominalised by 之/其

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As an inner power, pattern is very great indeed,

sense.def: 必也 "what is necessary" after topics other than personal names

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As an inner power, pattern is very great indeed,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: born together with Heaven and Earth. And how is this?

sense.def: be coordinated, be synchronized. occur together with 事與時並

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: born together with Heaven and Earth. And how is this?

sense.def: How is it possible that S

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: born together with Heaven and Earth. And how is this?

sense.def: particle marking a question as being of particular concern

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: All colors are compounded of two primary colors, the purple that is Heaven and the brown that is Earth.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: All colors are compounded of two primary colors, the purple that is Heaven and the brown that is Earth.

sense.def: the brellow colour (covering the range from yellow to brown, symbolic of Earth)

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: All colors are compounded of two primary colors, the purple that is Heaven and the brown that is Earth.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: All colors are compounded of two primary colors, the purple that is Heaven and the brown that is Earth.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: All forms are distinguished through two primary forms, Earth's squareness and Heaven's circularity.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: All forms are distinguished through two primary forms, Earth's squareness and Heaven's circularity.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: All forms are distinguished through two primary forms, Earth's squareness and Heaven's circularity.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: All forms are distinguished through two primary forms, Earth's squareness and Heaven's circularity.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: showing to those below images that cleave to Heaven.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: showing to those below images that cleave to Heaven.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Rivers and mountains are glittering finery,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Rivers and mountains are glittering finery,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: unrolling forms that give order to Earth.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: unrolling forms that give order to Earth.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: These are the pattern of the Way.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: These are the pattern of the Way.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Considering the radiance emitted above,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Considering the radiance emitted above,

sense.def: bright sunlight, bright light; the glare of the sun as reflected on things

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Considering the radiance emitted above,

sense.def: have a good look at, survey, have a look at and enjoy, visit to have a look at, sound out; poetically: gaze at

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Considering the radiance emitted above,

sense.def: bending back (so as to look upwards), looking upwards

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and reflecting on the loveliness that inhered below,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and reflecting on the loveliness that inhered below,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and reflecting on the loveliness that inhered below,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and reflecting on the loveliness that inhered below,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the two standards were generated.

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the two standards were generated.

sense.def: originate; come to emerge; be naturally found in (of inanimate subjects), occur naturally in

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Only the human being,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Only the human being,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Only the human being,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: endowed with the divine spark of consciousness,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: penetrate the secret recesses of the soul,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: penetrate the secret recesses of the soul,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: penetrate the secret recesses of the soul,

tls:line.title: Translation of 文心雕龍十卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: ranks as a third with this pair.

sense.def: basic constituents of the universe (as in 三才 "Heaven, Earth and Man)
